trans-unit.source: Represents the center panel of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表的中央面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用上方、 底部、 左邊與右邊的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>來保存<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripContentPanel to hold controls other than these.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ToolStripContentPanel 來保存這些以外的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The edges of the container to which a control is bound and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 容器的控制項繫結與隨其父代會決定如何調整控制項的邊緣。

trans-unit.source: Overridden to ensure that the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> reflects the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>結構，代表的背景色彩<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnLoad method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnLoad 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 呈現<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>, which contains all the information necessary to render the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>，其中包含呈現<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>所需的所有資訊</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPaintBackground 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
